====================
**Land Equipment Program - Engineering, Technical Services and Support (LEP-ETSS)**
--------

**Notice Reference**: WS3380261857-Doc3380311946
**Amendment Number**: 5
**Solicitation Number**: WS3380261857
**Publication Date**: November 21, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2023, 2 p.m. EST

The Government of Canada invites qualified bidders to submit bids for the provision of professional services in support of the Land Equipment Program. The scope of work involves various tasks including research, testing and evaluation, engineering and prototyping, limited fabrication, technical investigations, and documentation services. The successful bidder will provide Field Support Representatives, equipment management and support, and technical investigations, for military equipment managed by the Department of National Defence.

**Key Details**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.
* **Region of Opportunity**: None
* **Region of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Contact Information**: Jeremy Gagne, [jeremy.gagne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jeremy.gagne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note that this RFP is for a specific set of services to support the Land Equipment Program, and bidders must demonstrate their qualifications and experience to be considered. The tender closing date has been updated to March 31, 2023, at 2 p.m. EST. Late bids will not be accepted.

To access the complete RFP, please visit the Buyandsell website or the Ariba Discovery platform:

*   Buyandsell: http://buyandsell.gc.ca/ 
*   Ariba Discovery: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14604227?extsite\=MTQ2MDQyMjdf
